sentences.en: Appellation is a must in any language communication.
sentences.cn: 摘要称谓词语是语言交际中不可或缺的组成部分.

sentences.en: Chinese language appellation system takes the relatives appellation terms as the base.
sentences.cn: 汉语称谓以亲属称谓为基点.

sentences.en: Graves appellation is located just outside the town of Bordeaux.
sentences.cn: 格拉夫的地理位置就在波尔多小镇的外围.
他赢得了“反叛牧师”的称号。

sentences.en: How to change the abnormal psychology of others appellation? With animal cure? Be still psychological channel?
sentences.cn: 如何改变别人称谓的变态心理? 用动物治疗? 还是心理开导?

sentences.en: In this thesis, the influence of interpersonal relationship on appellation system is studied.
sentences.cn: 本文研究的核心正是中西人际关系对中西人际称谓系统的影响.

sentences.en: Membrane switch is a non - self - appellation of switch.
sentences.cn: 薄膜开关是一种否自琐开关.
并且这个称呼很中他的意.

sentences.en: Names the appellation and personal information of directors, supervisors, managers, or incorporators and.
sentences.cn: 董事 、 监察人 、 经理人, 或发起人之姓名(名称)及相关资料.

sentences.en: The appellation of heretics has always been applied to the less numerous parties.
sentences.cn: 异教徒的称呼常适用于少数人的团体.

sentences.en: The appellation stuck , and the age of the sequential hierarchical menu began.
sentences.cn: 其名称也从中而来, 于是顺序层次关系菜单时代开始了.

sentences.en: The basic features of the system of female appellation are affected by sexism without exception.
sentences.cn: 英语女性称谓系统的基本特征无一不浸透着性别歧视的影响.

sentences.en: The emperor of Russia Peter I was given the appellation " the Great ".
sentences.cn: 俄皇彼得一世被加上了 “ 大帝 ” 的称号.

sentences.en: The white wines made in the Volnay area are sold under the Meursault appellation.
sentences.cn: 沃尔内的白葡萄酒以墨索酒庄等级贩卖.

words.tran_cn: 通称名词，普通名词；称呼
